name: Sunday Brunch Casserole
author: T1INA
summary: A hearty bacon, egg, and hash brown casserole for the bacon lover in all of us. Feel free to use turkey bacon rather than pork!
ingredients: ½ cup chopped red bell pepper
1 (16 ounce) package frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels; reserving 2 tablespoons drippings in the skillet
Cook and stir onion and bell pepper over medium heat in reserved drippings until tender, about 5 minutes; remove with slotted spoon
Whisk eggs and milk in a large bowl
Fold hash browns, Cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, dill, onion mixture, and crumbled bacon into egg mixture; transfer to prepared baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes
